channel.title: How to change the welcome text in a 525 server?
channel.description: Hey could any1 help me with this i dont know how to do this cuz i searched evrywhere but nothing.

item.title: How to change the welcome text in a 525 server?
item.dc:creator: @melvino33 melvino33
item.description:
@melvino33 wrote:

Its not in the main folder like a 317 server… if it was a 317 server i didnt even asked cuz i know that to.

item.title: How to change the welcome text in a 525 server?
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

open your server folder where you saved it. Look for something that has a picture of a notepad and says Client Click it and click edit, then find, then the text.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the welcome text in a 525 server?

item.title: How to change the welcome text in a 525 server?
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

When you log on to the server, look at the text it says. Then open your client.java, and click, Edit, then find…and type in the text you saw when you logged in.

Read full topic
